webpages.name: Tony's Pizza
webpages.text:
We are thrilled to announce the upcoming grand opening of Tony's Pizza, your premier destination for authentic Italian cuisine delivered straight through your screen!
Join us on March 10th for a culinary extravaganza, featuring special promotions, exclusive discounts, and a chance to win free pizza for a year!
Type code "P1ZZ4" for a free sample ahead of the big event!
Type code "RECIPE" for a printout of our most popular recipe!

webpages.name: John's Music Blog
webpages.text:
Welcome to John's Music Blog! To download a song, type "download" and the name of the song you want.
1. John Lennon - Imagine
